      TreeNode methods******************
      static java.util.List<TreeNode> getProjectNodesByRightEager(boolean activeOnly, TPersonBean personBean, boolean allIfSystemAdmin, int[] right, boolean useChecked, boolean excludePrivateProject)
      Gets all not closed projects with explicit rights eagerly (the entire hierarchy at once)
      static java.lang.Integer getProjectStateFlag(java.util.Map<java.lang.Integer,TSystemStateBean> projectStatusMap, java.lang.Integer projectStatus)
      Gets the state flag for release
      static java.util.List<TreeNode> getProjectTreeForReleasesWithCompletedPath(java.util.List<java.lang.Integer> projectIDs, boolean useChecked, java.util.Set<java.lang.Integer> baseProjectIDs, boolean selectable, boolean negateNodeID, boolean modifiedNodeID, java.util.Map<java.lang.Integer,TreeNode> projectTreeNodeMap)
      Get the project hierarchy list based on the selected projects: if the projects have descendant projects (for example parent and grandChild but without the child) then the entire hierarchy will be shown (the child will be added) even if the path between the selected projects contain holes (not selected projects in the hierarchy path) the project nodes are with modified IDs because they are used on the same tree with the releases, and the duplication of IDs should be avoided
      static java.util.List<TreeNode> getUsedProjectNodesEager(TPersonBean personBean, boolean allIfSystemAdmin, int[] right, java.util.Set<java.lang.Integer> selectedProjectIDSet, boolean useChecked, boolean selectable, boolean negateNodeID, boolean modifyNodeID, boolean withParameter, java.util.Locale locale, java.util.Map<java.lang.Integer,TreeNode> treeNodeMap)
      Gets the not closed projects by rights and the RACI projects eagerly (the entire hierarchy at once)

      • getProjectTreeForReleasesWithCompletedPath

        public static java.util.List<TreeNode> getProjectTreeForReleasesWithCompletedPath(java.util.List<java.lang.Integer> projectIDs,
                                                                  boolean useChecked,
                                                                  java.util.Set<java.lang.Integer> baseProjectIDs,
                                                                  boolean selectable,
                                                                  boolean negateNodeID,
                                                                  boolean modifiedNodeID,
                                                                  java.util.Map<java.lang.Integer,TreeNode> projectTreeNodeMap)
        Get the project hierarchy list based on the selected projects: if the projects have descendant projects (for example parent and grandChild but without the child) then the entire hierarchy will be shown (the child will be added) even if the path between the selected projects contain holes (not selected projects in the hierarchy path) the project nodes are with modified IDs because they are used on the same tree with the releases, and the duplication of IDs should be avoided
        Parameters:
        projectIDs: - the list of base projects might contain descendant projects
        useChecked -
        baseProjectIDs - the projects to preselect
        selectable -
        negateNodeID -
        modifiedNodeID -
        projectTreeNodeMap - out parameter
        Returns:

      • getChildToParentMap

        public static java.util.Map<java.lang.Integer,java.lang.Integer> getChildToParentMap(java.util.List<TProjectBean> projectBeans,
                                                                     java.util.Map<java.lang.Integer,TProjectBean> involvedProjectsMap)
        Gets the child to parent map for the child projects starting from projectBeans up to the main projects
        Parameters:
        projectBeans -
        involvedProjectsMap: - out parameter

        allIfSystemAdmin -
        right -

        useChecked - whether the treeNode should have "checked" field
        selectable - whether to reset the selectable flag of the treeNode. Makes sense only if useChecked is false

        modifyNodeID -
        withParameter -
        locale -
        treeNodeMap - output parameter: map with all project nodes
        Returns:
